key_deliverables: Auth Service, RBAC, Salla OAuth Flow, Webhook Handler
demo_objectives: Login/Register flow; Salla connection flow with simulated callback
success_criteria: Secure tokens issued; Tenant isolation verified; OAuth flow functional
risk_factors: Salla API availability; Edge Middleware limitations
mitigation_strategies: Mock Salla API; Prototype edge middleware early

key_deliverables: Historical Sync Worker, ELT Processor, Analytics API
demo_objectives: Trigger sync job; View progress in DB; Query Analytics API
success_criteria: Sync handles pagination/rate limits; Data visible in ClickHouse; API < 200ms
risk_factors: Salla Rate Limits; ClickHouse schema efficiency

key_deliverables: Sales Trend Chart, RAG Service, AI Chat UI, Pipeline Tests
demo_objectives: View Sales Chart; Ask AI questions; Verify pipeline data latency
success_criteria: Chart matches data; AI generates valid SQL; Latency < 5min verified
risk_factors: AI SQL generation errors; Prompt engineering iterations
mitigation_strategies: Golden set testing; Fallback to deterministic search
